channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked drains near Cheddington House, 23rd October
item.description:
Hi Hackney Council, A recurring problem, a blocked drain around the side of Cheddington House. This is creating a bad smell that is now coming up the drains and into my bathroom. It's been an issue for at least a week now. Many thanks.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Whiston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rotting food on pavement and strong smell of vomit, 23rd October
item.description:
Foxes have spread food waste across the footpath outside 58 Adys Rd. There is rotting food and a strong smell of vomit which hasn’t been washed away with the recent rain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 58, Adys Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing street name sign, 23rd October
item.description:
There was an Abbey Road street sign high up on the wall of 37 Abbey Road which has been removed. You can see on the photo attached where it was. Not sure why it has been removed? Please replace as soon as possible. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Abbey Road, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Concern Regarding Cleanliness Outside Sainsbury’s Express – Beckenham Road, 23rd October
item.description:
I’m writing to raise a concern about the Sainsbury’s Express store located on Beckenham Road. The area immediately outside the shop consistently appears untidy, with litter scattered around on a regular basis. Given that this is a food retail outlet, the lack of cleanliness raises potential health and hygiene concerns that I believe require urgent attention. I would be grateful if you could speak with the store management or take appropriate action to ensure the area is maintained to a suitable standard. A cleaner and more presentable environment would benefit both the local community and the store’s reputation. Please could you look into this matter again, as the issue persists. Thank you for your time and support.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Hall Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green waste bin dumped, 23rd October
item.description:
I’m assuming that this green bin is no longer required or lost. It was placed here around 4 weeks ago and nobody has collected it. Haven’t seen any ‘lost’ posters on lampposts for it either. Please could it be removed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oxford Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on Brookhill Close, 23rd October
item.description:
Tree cuttings, a OAP push cart, plastic box full of rubbish. Please put more bins up and down Brookhill Road as the litter and fly tipping continues to be a massive issue. I walk down this street a couple of times a week and there is always something new that has been dumped.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Hill Close, London
